content.rendered:
Criteria:
Grade 12 + Qualified Mechanic/Mechanical technician with min T3 or N5 certificate
3 – 5 years Mechanical and technical skills experience
3-5 years of fleet maintenance Management experience
Excellent communication skills both written and verbal
Ability to analyze and improve operation processes
Analytical thinking skills
Strong problem solving and time management skills
Self-sufficient – the ability to work with the minimal supervision

MUST live in Stanger, KwaDukuza

Apply via website or alternatively, via: https://forms.gle/8mRbBqpY1WY7fSPs7
